__TOC__

* Face to face meet up on Thursday 4th of February with <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.ie/|ILUG]]</nowiki> in the <nowiki>[[http://www.thelongstone.com|Longstone]]</nowiki>. 

* Some members of the LoCo headed off to <nowiki>[[http://fosdem.org/2010/|Fosdem]]</nowiki>. From the great story's we are hearing, it must have been great fun. <nowiki>[[http://www.lczajkowski.com/2010/02/06/ubuntu-at-fosdem/|Some photos]]</nowiki>.

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2010-02-17|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 17th February 2010.

* A member of a Loco <nowiki>[[User:tdr]]</nowiki> organised a series of events for <nowiki>[[http://www.engineersweek.ie/ | Engineers Week]]</nowiki> in the local <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hackerspace| hackerspace]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://www.tog.ie|TOG]]</nowiki> , featuring many Open source <nowiki>[[http://www.tog.ie/page/2010/01/introduction-to-the-arduino-platform/ | Hardware]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[ http:--www.tog.ie-2010-01-using-open-source-tools-to-create-a-circuit-board-|software]]</nowiki> talks and workshops. A round up of the events can be found <nowiki>[[http://www.tog.ie/2010/02/engineers-week-roundup/| here]]</nowiki>. 

* We had a great <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Hour| Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> on the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-ie.org/node/88 | 24th of February]]</nowiki> at 6pm  at the <nowiki>[[http://www.trinitycapitalhotel.com/ | Trinity Capital Hotel bar]]</nowiki>. 

* We had a first big non-Dublin event of the year on the 28th of February in Limerick. With the help of <nowiki>[[http://www.skynet.ie/| Skynet]]</nowiki> we had a great day of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/Events/February-2010-Talks | talks]]</nowiki> and a great night too.

* Plans are well under way for our next big event next month. Open Jam. <nowiki>[[ http:--www.lczajkowski.com-2010-02-19-open-jam- | More details]]</nowiki>.
